org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime

Class HierarchiesTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dgfoundation.amp.nireports.runtime.HierarchiesTracker

  • public class HierarchiesTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which tracks the hierarchies which have been applied on top of a cell. You can read a (long) description on how it works here https://wiki.dgfoundation.org/display/AMPDOC/3.+NiReports+runtime#id-3.NiReportsruntime-3.4.1Percentagestrackingruntime

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      HierarchiesTracker advanceHierarchy(Cell cell)
      advances a hierarchy according to the main level of a given cell.
      Please notice that this function will return thiscrash in case the cell does not have a mainLevel: THIS IS INTENTIONAL, as one cannot calculate percentages by columns whose cells have no main dimension
      HierarchiesTracker advanceHierarchy(NiDimension.LevelColumn level, long id, java.math.BigDecimal cellPercentage) 
      static HierarchiesTracker buildEmpty(CacheHitsCounter stats) 
      java.math.BigDecimal calculatePercentage(java.util.function.Predicate<NiDimension.NiDimensionUsage> acceptor) 
      java.lang.String toString()
